title: Animal magic fudge cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '175g unsalted butter, softened', '175g golden caster sugar', '3 large eggs, beaten', '175g self-raising flour', '50g fudge, chopped into small pieces', 'For the fudge icing', '140g fudge, chopped', '50g unslated butter', '3 tablespoons milk', '115g icing sugar', 'To decorate', 'Chocolate sprinkles', 'Coloured marzipan or sugarpaste (see directions)']
